ect of layer charge density on water moleculars di
molecular and atomic levels has been studied by MD techniques. In order to macroscopically study
ect of charge density on hydration performance of montmorillonite, some experimental studies
on the hydration performance of montmorillonite were conducted. TG and DTG were used to study
the thermal stability and the di
erence in water precipitation temperature among montmorillonites.
The swelling capacity and the gelling value were used to evaluate the swelling and dispersibility

indicates that as the charge density increases, the precipitation temperature of interlayer water of
